name: TheNewRitreiv -Test
description:
This is a common lure fishing game in Japan.

<Operation method> ◇ Character move --- Move with W, A, S, D keys. Jump with the space key. ◇ Casting --- Move the mouse while holding down the left mouse button, and release the left button at the timing of casting. ◇ Reeling --- Wind up the thread with the right mouse button. ◇ Reeling speed --- Adjust with the mouse wheel during reeling (while pressing the right mouse button). ◇ Drag adjustment --- You can adjust the mouse wheel up and down while the right mouse button is not pressed. Other settings --- You can open the menu with the M key. Adjust the speed value with Cast Sensitive in "Options" <rule> There is no game clear or game over. When you catch a fish, you will get a point "gP" proportional to the weight. When gP (gram points) are accumulated, new equipment will be unlocked and you can purchase it. ☆ 3000g P / line 8lb ☆ 5000g P / Metal Ji 10g You will be notified on the screen when the equipment is released. Please check from "Equipment" on the menu screen.
